email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out with a freight offer for 85,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV IRON MAIDEN, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. The laycan is set for 20th to 25th October, and the initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.75 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo Group

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 20,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains 20th to 25th October. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 18.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo Group

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Tubarão on 20th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo Group

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV IRON MAIDEN
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritime Traders
